greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of rooted maps with n edges on a nonorientable surface of genus k (1 <= k <= n).
reference: David M. Jackson  and Terry I. Visentin, An Atlas of the Smaller Maps in Orientable and Nonorientable Surfaces, Chapman & Hall/CRC, circa 2000. See page 227.
xref: See A238396 for analog for orientable surfaces.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 16 2016
